data.name: Variable Rate Small Business Loan
data.description: With one of the longest business lending terms in the market, we can help you grow your business whilst optimising your repayments.

features.additionalInfo: Loan term up to 30 years, depending on rate option chosen and security provided.

Borrow up to $3m to buy owner-occupied commercial business premises or for business expansion with loan to value ratios of up to 100% of the value of residential property security or 80% of the value of non-specialised commercial property security.

Special Offer: 3 year discounted rate 6.49% p.a. on Business Loans. Applications must be submitted by 30 November 2023 with settlement by 29 February 2024. Includes 2.74%p.a. discount for 3 year loan terms from settlement date applied to the Business Loan rate. Credit & security criteria, T&C's, charges apply.
Security options include cash, property, a guarantee or business assets.
Flexible repayment structures include Interest Only or Principle, Interest and Fees.
Subject to terms and conditions, this product has EXTRA_REPAYMENTS option available.
Relationship management is available for eligible customers.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Customer  should be - A business entity domiciled in Australia or an individual 18 years and above or strata corporation domiciled in Australia and requires the funding for business or investment purposes other than investment in residential property
